mapper.update: UPDATE tb_role SET parent_id = #{parentId, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, role_desc = #{role.description, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, role_name = #{role.name} WHERE id = #{role.id}
mapper.select: SELECT id, role_desc, role_name FROM tb_role WHERE c.role_name = #{roleName}

SELECT c.id AS c_id, c.role_desc AS c_role_desc, c.role_name AS c_role_name, p.id AS p_id, p.role_desc AS p_role_desc, p.role_name AS p_role_name FROM tb_role AS c LEFT OUTER JOIN tb_role AS p ON c.parent_id = p.id

SELECT c.id AS c_id, c.role_desc AS c_role_desc, c.role_name AS c_role_name, p.id AS p_id, p.role_desc AS p_role_desc, p.role_name AS p_role_name FROM tb_role AS c LEFT OUTER JOIN tb_role AS p ON c.parent_id = p.id LIMIT #{offset}, #{size}
